tasks.task: The narrator rides in a truck driving through a field checking crops.
subtasks: Enter into a truck.
Drive a truck on a field path.
Observe crops while driving.

tasks.task: The narrator picks six ears of corn from the field.
subtasks: Approach a corn stalk.
Identify six corn ears.
Physically detach six corn ears from corn stalk.
Hold six corn ears.

tasks.task: The narrator rubs the corn to remove some of the husks.
subtasks: Take a corn ear in hand.
Rub the outer husks of the corn ear between fingers to remove some of the husk.

tasks.task: The narrator snaps the kernels off the corn using their teeth.
subtasks: Place corn ear between teeth.
Use teeth to separate the kernels from the cob, removing them.

tasks.task: The narrator checks the corn's sweetness.
subtasks: Take a corn ear after teeth have worked on it.
Smell or taste the kernels to assess sweetness.

tasks.task: The narrator smells the ear of corn.
subtasks: Take the corn ear to nose.
Sniff the corn ear to check for aroma.

tasks.task: The narrator spits out the cob of the eaten corn.
subtasks: Hold the remaining cob part after eating the kernels.
Disgorge the cob by spitting it out.

tasks.task: The narrator chews and swallows the corn.
subtasks: Place corn kernels in mouth.
Chew the corn kernels.
Swallow the chewed corn.

tasks.task: The narrator shifts gears on the truck.
subtasks: In the truck, move from one gear to another.

tasks.task: The narrator uncovers a metal gate to access a field.
subtasks: Approach a metal gate.
Physically open a metal gate to enter a field.

tasks.task: The narrator walks through a gate into a field.
subtasks: Walk through an opening in the gate.
Enter the field via the opened gate.

tasks.task: The narrator checks equipment in a hallway.
subtasks: Walk into a hallway or building.
Examine agricultural equipment, possibly in a garage or shed.

tasks.task: The narrator walks around a truck bed.
subtasks: Approach the back of a truck.
Walk around the rear of the truck to check the bed.

tasks.task: The narrator opens a metal box on the bottom of the truck.
subtasks: Find a metal box attached beneath the truck.
Open the metal box.

tasks.task: The narrator lifts the box out from under the truck.
subtasks: Using physical strength, lift the metal box from under the truck.

tasks.task: The narrator puts the box inside the truck and under the seat.
subtasks: Transport the box by lifting it and placing it behind the driver's seat.

tasks.task: The narrator sits on a tractor seat while giving instructions.
subtasks: Sit in a tractor's driver's seat.
Give operating instructions or directions related to a tractor.

tasks.task: The narrator gets into a tractor.
subtasks: Enter onto a tractor, possibly sitting into the driver's seat.

tasks.task: The narrator uncovers a seed corn bag from the ground.
subtasks: Reach into the ground or under debris to expose a seed corn bag.
Remove the seed corn bag from the ground or secluded spot.

tasks.task: The narrator holds a seed corn bag.
subtasks: Take the uncovered seed corn bag with hands.

tasks.task: The narrator writes code related to the field and corn data.
subtasks: Write or input data into a device, likely recording field or corn information.

tasks.task: The narrator checks a clip board.
subtasks: Examine a clipboard or similar device.

tasks.task: The narrator references a map on the dashboard for navigation.
subtasks: Look at a map or navigation tool placed on the dashboard of a vehicle.

tasks.task: The narrator inspects a hole in the ground where corn was growing.
subtasks: Approach an area where corn once stood, checking for the presence of a hole.

tasks.task: The narrator checks the temperature of the pump in the well.
subtasks: Visit a well equipped with a pump.
Assess the temperature of the pump or water from the well.

tasks.task: The narrator uses the tailgate of a truck as a makeshift workspace.
subtasks: Use the raised tailgate (bed extension) of a truck as a surface for working.

tasks.task: The narrator uses an oily rag to clean parts of a machine.
subtasks: Dip an oily rag into a container (implied: oil or cleaner) to wipe parts of a machine.

tasks.task: The narrator interacts with a yellow vehicle, likely a tractor or piece of farm equipment.
subtasks: Approach and possibly enter a yellow vehicle, but the exact interaction isn't detailed.

tasks.task: The narrator checks a black metal container likely on a truck or trailer.
subtasks: Inspect a black metal container, perhaps checking its contents or securing it.

tasks.task: The narrator removed and replaced a plastic mulch from the ground during planting.
subtasks: Displace plastic mulch that was previously covering the ground for planting.

tasks.task: The narrator holds a weed killer applicator while walking through a field.
subtasks: Carry a weed killer applicator (sprayer) while moving through a field.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: The narrator installs a gas cap on a piece of equipment.
subtasks: Approach a gas canister or the fueling port of equipment.
Secure the gas cap onto the equipment's fueling port.

tasks.task: The narrator applies herbicide directly to weeds.
subtasks: Pour or spray herbicide onto weeds with an applicator or nozzle.

tasks.task: The narrator uses a sprayer to spread seed.
subtasks: Operate a sprayer to disperse seed while moving through a field.

tasks.task: The narrator cracks open a container to retrieve items.
subtasks: Open a container (like a box or container on the truck) and retrieve necessary items.

tasks.task: The narrator fills a bag with something (likely corn).
subtasks: Take a bag and fill it with corn ears or corn products.

tasks.task: The narrator checks the temperature of the soil.
subtasks: Measure or assess the temperature of the soil using a probe or similar tool.

tasks.task: The narrator applies a liquid to the soil.
subtasks: Pour or spray a liquid (possibly fertilizer or treatment) onto the soil surface.

tasks.task: The narrator uses a hand tool to take samples from the field.
subtasks: Collect soil samples or take other types of samples from the field using hand tools.

tasks.task: The narrator checks pressure settings on a water pump.
subtasks: Adjust or check the pressure gauge on a water pump.

tasks.task: The narrator tests the operating condition of a power steering system.
subtasks: Evaluate the functionality of a power steering mechanism, possibly by turning the steering wheel or pressing the pedal.

tasks.task: The narrator uses a small ladder to check equipment on a higher part of the truck.
subtasks: Mount a small ladder or step stool to reach equipment located higher up on the truck.
Inspect or service equipment that is elevated.

tasks.task: The narrator inspects a sensor or gauge on a piece of machinery.
subtasks: Approach a sensor or gauge on a piece of equipment and visually or manually assess it.

tasks.task: The narrator stokes a boiler using a rake.
subtasks: Use a rake to add fuel or kindling to a boiler or circulator.

tasks.task: The narrator replaces a worn part on a machine.
subtasks: Remove a defective component and replace it with a new one on a machine.

tasks.task: The narrator disassembles a machine part to check for issues.
subtasks: Break down a machine's part to inspect for damage or problems.

tasks.task: The narrator uses a sprayer to apply a substance to a machine.
subtasks: Spray a liquid or dust onto a machine's surface with a sprayer.

tasks.task: The narrator cleans mud or dirt off the wheels of a vehicle.
subtasks: Remove mud, dirt, or similar debris from the tires and surrounding area of a vehicle using a rag or hose.

tasks.task: The narrator applies lubricant to a moving part.
subtasks: Apply lubricating oil or grease to a component that is moving or in use.

tasks.task: The narrator inspects a chain on a piece of machinery.
subtasks: Examine the condition of a chain, looking for wear or damage.

tasks.task: The narrator lubricates a chainsaw chain.
subtasks: Use a lubricant to coat a chainsaw chain to reduce friction.

tasks.task: The narrator talks into a microphone recording voice or video.
subtasks: Speak into a camera or microphone, likely for recording purposes.

tasks.task: The narrator records video or audio explanations.
subtasks: Filming or audio recording of explanations or comments about the tasks or equipment.

tasks.task: The narrator hammers a nail into a wall.
subtasks: Drive a nail into a wall using a hammer.

tasks.task: The narrator lifts a fuel container onto a vehicle.
subtasks: Pick up a fuel can or drum and place it onto a vehicle, possibly a truck.

tasks.task: The narrator checks a trailer hitch.
subtasks: Inspect the hitch mechanism of a trailer attached to a vehicle.

tasks.task: The narrator adjusts the angle of a mirror on a vehicle.
subtasks: Move or fine-tune the positioning of a vehicle's rearview mirror or side mirror.

tasks.task: The narrator changes the oil filter on a piece of equipment.
subtasks: Remove the old oil filter and install a new one on a piece of machinery.

tasks.task: The narrator changes the oil on a piece of equipment.
subtasks: Drain old oil, replace filter, add new oil to a piece of machinery.

tasks.task: The narrator replaces a part on a piece of equipment.
subtasks: Remove broken or damaged part, install new part on a machine.

tasks.task: The narrator deals with a machine that's not moving.
subtasks: Overcome the issue of a machine being stuck or non-operational.

tasks.task: The narrator takes a hay bale from a hay wagon and places it behind the tractor.
subtasks: Approach a hay bale on a wagon or loader.
Lift and move a hay bale from the wagon to a position behind the tractor.

tasks.task: The narrator checks the tire pressure on a vehicle.
subtasks: Use a gauge or air pump to check and adjust tire pressure on a vehicle's wheels.

tasks.task: The narrator marks a field for soybean planting.
subtasks: Use a marking device (flame thrower?) or flagging to denote the intended planting area for soybeans.

tasks.task: The narrator applies a substance to crops to control weeds.
subtasks: Spray or apply an herbicide to specific areas within a field to manage weeds.

tasks.task: The narrator replaces a seat cushion on a tractor.
subtasks: Remove the damaged seat cushion and insert a new one into the tractor's seat.

tasks.task: The narrator clean the seat of a vehicle.
subtasks: Thoroughly clean the seat (potentially grimy from fieldwork) with a rag or cleaning solution.

tasks.task: The narrator inspects a display for proper operation.
subtasks: Check that all indicators on a machine's display are functioning correctly.

tasks.task: The narrator performs a trial run of a machine.
subtasks: Operationally test a piece of machinery for issues before full use.

tasks.task: The narrator pushes a button on a machine's control panel.
subtasks: Activate a button or switch on a machine's control system to test its function.
